imdb: Josh learns the truth about Reva's breast cancer. Ava and Olivia have it out over Ava's birth father. Cassie and Josh are angry about not being told about Reva's cancer months ago and vow to stay by her side for whatever time she has left. Ava turns to Alan-Michael for help in finding her birth father. Buzz finds the St. Jude medal Olivia has been hiding.
